keys.galleryPhotos.App.title: Restaurant Profile
keys.galleryPhotos.grid.deleteModal: Are you sure you want to delete?
keys.galleryPhotos.panelDescription: Use gallery photos to enhance your restaurant's OpenTable profile page.
keys.galleryPhotos.photoUpload.description.1: Photos boost diners’ confidence in booking a reservation. Use photos that best convey your restaurant’s ambiance and guest experience.
keys.galleryPhotos.photoUpload.description.2: or drag and drop files to upload
keys.galleryPhotos.guidelines.listItem.3: Use minimum dimensions of 512 x 512 (most smartphone photos will work)
keys.galleryPhotos.guidelines.listItem.4: Upload up to 50 photos at a time
keys.galleryPhotos.guidelines.listItem.5: Don't use your logo or menu
keys.galleryPhotos.legalMessage: By uploading photos, you agree that we may use these photo(s) to promote your restaurant and us. As a reminder, in our Agreement you represent and warrant that you have the rights to grant this license. Note: photo credits will not be posted.
